text: Fred G. Heyman was an American football player and coach. He served as the head football coach at Bethany College in Bethany, West Virginia in 1916. He played college football at Washington & Jefferson College. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing Category:Year of death missing Category:American football ends Category:Massillon Tigers players Category:Washington & Jefferson Presidents football players Category:Bethany Bison football coaches Category:Bethany Bison baseball coaches
title: Fred Heyman
